name: 1_30_dollar
instructions:
This is zero-sum bargaining and you should get as much of the $2.00 as you can, with any story you like.

It is really important that you should get at least $1.30 in this round.
victory_condition: Receive at least $1.30 AND reach a deal
failure_condition: Receive less than $1.30 OR no deal reached
